name: Angelcat and Friends Collection - Paulie Penguin
description:
Angel Cat and Friends is about Cheonsa the Cat, an angel cat sent to earth to help fellow animals do good deeds. To disguise herself and do her mission, Cheonsa runs Coffee Cat, a café that caters to all animals in town. Her most frequent customers are Danny Dog, Rita Rabbit, Paulie Penguin, Chase Chick, Owen Owl and Barry Bear. Each of them has his/her own likes and dislikes as well as good and bad traits. With her yummy food and drinks, little pieces of advice and some help with their needs, Cheonsa inspires them to become better versions of themselves. This NFT is one of Cheonsa's friends and café customers, Paulie Penguin.

Paulie Penguin is a businessman from the South Pole who often travels a lot in order to trade his products. He often goes to the café when he’s in town to show his friends and other customers his latest products. He is a bit of a showoff, but he can be very generous especially to those in need.
